channel.title: CVE Feed for J’s Communication Co., Ltd. -- RevoWorks Browser
channel.description: The latest CVEs for J’s Communication Co., Ltd. -- RevoWorks Browser

item.title: CVE-2021-20790|2024-08-03T17:53:22.375Z -- j%E2%80%99s%20communication%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- revoworks%20browser
item.description: Improper control of program execution vulnerability in RevoWorks Browser 2.1.230 and earlier allows an attacker to execute an arbitrary command or code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20791|2024-08-03T17:53:22.425Z -- j%E2%80%99s%20communication%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- revoworks%20browser
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in RevoWorks Browser 2.1.230 and earlier allows an attacker to bypass access restriction and to exchange unauthorized files between the local environment and the isolated environment or settings of the web browser via unspecified vectors.
